column4: Or, here's another question to ignore: Why is it that I can specify the ESSID, but when checking iwconfig, I see that the AP's MAC address doesn't match the AP's actual MAC address?
routers and switches have multiple mac addresses -- one for each ethernet interface
I'd make sure that both sides were talking the same authentication and encryption protocols -- 64/128bit WEP vs WPA, etc
i'm not too sure as i dont run wireless on my linux machine -- iwconfig --help might give you an indicator
